quotes.quote: Our rights do not come from government. They come from God. The Constitution is not a grant of rights; it is a recognition of rights that already exist.
The most patriotic thing you can do is to ask questions of your government.
You have to be willing to offend people to tell the truth. The truth is not always popular, but it is always the truth.
The American Dream is alive and well, but you have to be willing to work for it. It's not a handout; it's a hand up.
Capitalism is the greatest engine of prosperity the world has ever known. It has lifted more people out of poverty than any other system in history.
quotes.source: TPUSA Live at University of Florida

quotes.quote: The university system has become a left-wing indoctrination camp where they teach you to hate our country.
Socialism is a philosophy of failure, the creed of ignorance, and the gospel of envy; its inherent virtue is the equal sharing of misery.
If you want to save America, you have to be willing to fight for the traditional family. It is the bedrock of civilization.
The greatest threat to America is not a foreign enemy, but the internal decay of our values and our culture.
Big Tech, Big Government, and Big Media are in an unholy alliance to silence conservative voices. We will not be silenced.
Freedom of speech is not just the right to say what is popular. It's the right to say what is controversial, and even what is offensive.
We are not a nation of victims. We are a nation of victors. It's time we start acting like it.
The battle for the soul of America is not being fought on a battlefield; it's being fought in the classroom, in the boardroom, and in your living room.
A strong border is not racist; it is a fundamental requirement for national sovereignty.
The nuclear family is the single greatest institution for human flourishing. We must defend it at all costs.
Wokeness is a secular religion that has infected every aspect of our society. The only cure is a return to truth and common sense.
Don't just consume culture, create it. Build businesses, start families, and make art that reflects our values.
Courage is contagious. When one person stands up, it gives others the strength to stand up with them.
The Green New Deal is not about the climate; it's about control. It's a socialist trojan horse designed to remake the American economy.
There is no such thing as 'your truth.' There is only 'the truth.'
Individual responsibility is the cornerstone of a free society. When we outsource our choices to the state, we lose our liberty.
The Second Amendment is not about hunting. It's about preserving a free state from tyranny.
We must choose patriotism over globalism. America first, America always.
Cancel culture is a tool of the modern left to enforce ideological conformity. It is the enemy of free thought.
Energy independence is national security. A nation that cannot power itself cannot defend itself.
The Constitution was written to limit the government, not the people.
Hard work is a virtue. Entitlement is a vice.
The media is not the watchdog of the powerful; they are the marketing arm of the Democratic Party.
To be a conservative is to be a joyful warrior. We fight for our principles with a smile on our face and love for our country in our hearts.
The American flag is not a symbol of oppression; it is a symbol of liberation for millions around the world.
Religious freedom is the first freedom. Without it, all other freedoms are in jeopardy.
The free market, not government bureaucracy, is the most efficient allocator of resources.
Every single time socialism has been tried, it has ended in famine, misery, and death. Why would we try it again?
Our founders were not perfect men, but they created a perfect document that has guided the most prosperous and free nation in history.
A nation without borders is not a nation at all.
The purpose of education is to teach children how to think, not what to think.
Men and women are different. To deny this is to deny biology, common sense, and thousands of years of human civilization.
If you don't stand for something, you will fall for anything.
The path to success is paved with failure. Don't be afraid to fail; be afraid of not trying.
Limited government, fiscal responsibility, and free markets. These are not just slogans; they are the pillars of American prosperity.
The loudest voices are often the most empty. Seek wisdom, not volume.
Our history is not a source of shame; it is a source of strength. We learn from our mistakes, but we celebrate our triumphs.
The right to life is the most fundamental right. Without it, no other rights matter.
Personal liberty is the ultimate goal. The government's role is to protect that liberty, not to grant it.
The swamp in Washington D.C. is deep. It will take a generation of patriots to drain it.
The federal bureaucracy is an unelected fourth branch of government that is accountable to no one.
A victimhood mindset is a prison of your own making. Choose to be a victor.
Defunding the police is an insane idea that leads to chaos and anarchy in our communities.
We don't need a great reset; we need a great renewal of American principles.
The future of the conservative movement is on the college campus. That is the battlefield where the war of ideas is being waged.
You cannot have a free society without a virtuous people.
The fight for America is a spiritual battle as much as it is a political one.
China is the single greatest geopolitical threat to the United States in the 21st century.
Taxes are a necessary evil, but they should be low, simple, and fair.
The American spirit is one of innovation, exploration, and resilience. It cannot be suppressed.
We must reject the politics of division and embrace the principles that unite us as Americans.
A well-informed citizenry is the best defense against tyranny.
The best social program is a good-paying job.
Do not let the left define the terms of the debate. We must fight on our own terms, with our own language.
Facts don't care about your feelings, and reality doesn't bend to your ideology.
The American founding is worth celebrating, not apologizing for.
The breakdown of law and order is a direct result of progressive policies.
We need more entrepreneurs and fewer bureaucrats.
The pursuit of happiness is a right, not a guarantee of happiness.
quotes.source: Speech on the Declaration of Independence

quotes.quote: Merit, not identity, should be the basis for advancement in our society.
The government that governs least, governs best.
You have a moral obligation to be a strong and capable individual.
The left wants to control what you say, what you think, and how you live. We want you to be free.
Our cities are failing because of decades of failed liberal leadership.
The legacy media is dying because they chose to be activists instead of journalists.
A republic, if you can keep it. It's up to our generation to keep it.
The world is a dangerous place. A strong military is not a provocation; it is a deterrent.
Don't just win the argument; win the convert.
The silent majority is silent no more.
We believe in legal immigration, not open borders.
The future belongs to the brave, not the timid.
Every day is a battle for the heart and soul of this country. Get in the fight.
School choice empowers parents and creates competition, leading to better outcomes for all students.
Political correctness is intellectual cowardice.
The foundation of our republic is the consent of the governed.
You are the future of the conservative movement. The responsibility is on your shoulders.
Never apologize for being a patriot.
The welfare state creates a cycle of dependency that is difficult to escape.
The right to private property is essential for a free and prosperous society.
The biggest lie of the left is that America is a systemically racist country.
Faith, family, and freedom. These are the values that made America great, and they are the values that will save America.
The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.
A nation's culture is its immune system. If the culture is sick, the nation is sick.
The American experiment is a story of progress, not a story of perfection.
Local action is the most powerful force for change. Get involved in your school board, your city council.
The digital public square should be a place for free expression, not a curated garden for the ruling class.
Victory is not an option; it is a necessity.
The erosion of our currency through inflation is a hidden tax on every American.
We must have the courage to speak the truth, even if our voice shakes.
The global elites want a world without borders, without national identity. We want a world of strong, sovereign nations.
The radical environmental movement is anti-human and anti-progress.
Being a conservative means believing in the potential of the individual.
The greatest form of charity is to help someone get a job and become self-sufficient.
History is not a buffet where you can pick and choose the parts you like. You must confront all of it.
The debt our nation is accumulating is a moral crime being committed against future generations.
It is not the government's job to make you happy; it is the government's job to protect your right to pursue happiness.
Stand up, speak out, and never, ever give up on America.
Critical Race Theory is not history; it is a racist ideology designed to divide us.
The American people are tired of being managed by a coastal elite that despises them.
You cannot be a good citizen if you are not a good neighbor.
The left doesn't want to debate you; they want to deplatform you.
Our universities have traded the pursuit of truth for the pursuit of social justice.
Masculinity is not toxic. It is the source of strength, provision, and protection for our society.
The federal government has become a leviathan that is crushing the spirit of the American people.
A free press is essential for a free society, but what we have is a state-run press.
The decline of faith in America is directly correlated with the rise of our social problems.
We are not defined by our grievances; we are defined by our greatness.
The woke mind virus has infected our corporations, our schools, and even our military.
The most powerful words in the American lexicon are 'We the People'.
Our children do not belong to the state; they belong to their parents.
The fight against tyranny is a relay race, not a sprint. We must pass the baton to the next generation.
American exceptionalism is not a boast; it is a statement of fact.
The obsession with equity is a rejection of equality of opportunity.
A nation that forgets its history is a nation that has no future.
The American West was settled by pioneers, not socialists.
The purpose of a border is to distinguish between those who are part of the national family and those who are not.
The greatest privilege is to be born an American.
You can't have a First Amendment without a Second Amendment.
The conservative movement is the new counter-culture.
The administrative state is a direct assault on our constitutional republic.
Character is what you do when no one is watching.
The left promises you a cage of security in exchange for your freedom.
We must build new institutions to rival the corrupt ones of the left.
The American citizen should be the master of the government, not its servant.
Globalism is a creed for the rootless and the resentful.
The family is the original department of health, education, and welfare.
The truth will always be a hate crime to those who hate the truth.
We need to stop funding our own demise by sending our children to institutions that teach them to despise our way of life.
The American heartland is the true heart of this nation.
The left's vision of the future is a gray, uniform, and joyless world. Our vision is one of color, diversity, and freedom.
A strong dollar is a sign of a strong America.
The only diversity the left cares about is diversity of skin color, not diversity of thought.
We are a nation of laws, not a nation of men.
The pursuit of comfort is the enemy of greatness.
The cultural Marxists have marched through our institutions. It's time we march them out.
The greatest act of rebellion in modern America is to build a traditional family.
We must not allow our country to be governed by the most offended person on Twitter.
The American way of life is worth defending.
The managerial class in this country has nothing but contempt for the working people they rule over.
The ultimate source of our law is the Laws of Nature and of Nature's God.
A generation that is not taught to love its country will not defend it.
The left's utopia is always just one more government program away.
The only safe space is the one you create for yourself through strength and competence.
The American frontier is not closed. The next frontier is in technology, in space, and in the human heart.
When the government fears the people, there is liberty. When the people fear the government, there is tyranny.
The purpose of life is not to find yourself; it is to build yourself.
The radical LGBT agenda is being pushed on our children without parental consent. This must stop.
The Declaration of Independence is the promise; the Constitution is the fulfillment.
The solution to most of our problems is not more government; it's more freedom.
A society that celebrates weakness will be conquered by a society that celebrates strength.
The American system is designed for gridlock. That's a feature, not a bug. It prevents the government from acting too quickly.
The most important political office is that of the private citizen.
The left's environmentalism is a watermelon: green on the outside, red on the inside.
The greatest inheritance we can leave our children is a free country.
The only thing the left has to offer is a managed decline into mediocrity.
You have a duty to be informed. Apathy is the silent partner of tyranny.
The American story is a story of redemption.
The expert class has been wrong about almost everything for the last fifty years.
The judiciary has become a super-legislature, creating laws out of thin air.
A man who will not work to feed his family is not a man.
The left seeks to replace the worship of God with the worship of the state.
Our supply chains should be in the American heartland, not in Communist China.
The revolution will not be televised; it will be livestreamed.
The Constitution is not a living document; it is a timeless one.
We must be the generation that restores the American republic.
The left is very good at organizing. We have to be better.
The American people are the most generous people on earth. We don't need the government to be our charitable arm.
The war on fossil fuels is a war on the American middle class.
A nation that cannot control its own borders will not long be a nation.
The American character is one of rugged individualism, not collectivist conformity.
The best way to honor our veterans is to preserve the freedom they fought to defend.
The left is trying to erase our past so they can control our future.
A college degree has become a four-year-long exercise in debt accumulation and ideological brainwashing.
The American way is to solve problems through innovation and entrepreneurship, not government mandates.
The arc of the moral universe does not bend on its own. We must bend it towards justice.
The greatest threat to free speech is the idea that some speech is too dangerous to be heard.
The American family is the ultimate start-up.
The left's idea of tolerance is that you must agree with them, or they will destroy you.
The American system of government is the best ever devised by man for the promotion of human freedom and flourishing.
The only thing the left builds is resentment.
The American spirit is not found in the halls of power in Washington D.C.; it is found in the hearts of the American people.
The only way to deal with a bully is to punch back twice as hard.
The American dream is not a guarantee; it is an opportunity.
The left is not interested in equality; they are interested in revenge.
The American system is based on the idea that the individual is sovereign.
The only way to save the West is to have the courage to say that the West is worth saving.
The American people are the ultimate check on the power of the government.
The most important battles are fought and won in the home.
